name: Mumma's Hostel Cairns
description:
Welcome to Mumma's Hostel Cairns!

Experience a tranquil retreat in the heart of Cairns at Mumma's Hostel, where we pride ourselves on being a clean and peaceful, non-party environment. Our serene atmosphere is perfect for unwinding after a day of work or adventure. Enjoy our outdoor swimming pool, lush garden, BBQ area, and cozy shared lounge.

Located within walking distance of Cairns Lagoon and the esplanade, you’ll also find shopping, dining, nightlife and entertainment just steps away.

Our travel partner offer great tour promotions at unbeatable prices!
Enjoy a free breakfast each morning to start your day right. Plus, we’re just a 10-minute drive from the airport!

Our comfortable rooms feature high-quality beds with curtains for privacy, electric power point, and lamps at each bed. Enjoy air conditioning and free WiFi in a welcoming environment. Engage in games like billiards and table tennis, or take a moment to relax in our calm surroundings.

Mumma's Hostel is your ideal home away from home!

Age recommendation: 18-35 years old

Reception Hours are: 8 am until Midnight
Check-in is after 2pm
Check-out is before 10am

Mumma’s Hostel Cairns | Where Mates Become Family ♥

Mumma's Cairns Facilities
- Free Wifi Free 
- Free 8 ball 
- Female Only Dorms 
- Laundry 
- Beds with curtain and powerpoint
- Luggage Storage 
- Pool Area
- Private Rooms
- Air Conditioning

groupInformation.terms: No parties please. Normal house rules apply to all groups.
groupInformation.cancellationTerms:
Full payment for groups is required 14 days prior to arrival.
Cancellation / no show / reduction in group numbers within 1 week of arrival will receive no refund.

houseRules.notes:
Check in from : 14:00 to Midnight
Check out before 10:00
Reception Hours are: 8 am until Midnight
Free Breakfast in the morning. 

All guests agree that by occupying accommodation at Mumma's Hostel , you shall be personally responsible for all charges. This will include any damages to dormitory or our general areas. It is a condition of a guest's occupancy that the owners of the premises - business will not be liable for damage to or loss of property brought onto the premises by the occupier or their guests. Smoking is NOT permitted in any dorms. Guests breaking any rule will be evicted immediately with no refund.

You must be at least 18 years of age to make a booking of any accommodation displayed on our site, and our age recommendation is 18-35 years old. You must make payment of 15% deposit for accommodation when booking on our site.The amount debited will be the amount shown on the booking page. Depending upon the currency of the booking, your credit card's currency and the country in which your card was issued, your credit card provider may impose foreign exchange fees and other fees which are in accordance with your arrangements with that credit card provider. Payment upon arrival by credit cards and debit cards only. This property may pre-authorise your card before arrival. 

To change any details of your booking, you must contact us by phone or email us. We will do our best to assist you, but cannot guarantee that changes can be made. 
If you cancel your booking on a non-refundable rate you will be charged the full amount and loose your bed space, we may re sell the bed, This also applies for no shows you will be charged in full. Flexible rates are able to cancel for free up until 24 hours prior to their check in at Mumma's Hostel. Cancellations inside of this time window will incur a cost of 1 nights accommodation fee,  As always, we highly value your patronage and will endeavour to make your stay. 
Mumma's Hostel Cairns an excellent experience. We reserve the right to cancel a booking for any reason.

A VALID PASSPORT AND A CREDIT CARD ARE MANDATORY UPON CHECK IN
